Legal_Issue: Whether the Board erred in determining that an internal flight alternative (IFA) existed for the applicant in Pereira
Application_Facts: insufficient proof of FARC locating the applicant in Pereira
no adverse conditions jeopardizing safety in Pereira
applicant claimed refugee protection due to threats from FARC
Decision_Outcome: The application for judicial review is dismissed
Remedy_Requested: Judicial review of the Board's decision on IFA
Court_Ruling: The court dismissed the application for judicial review, upholding the Board's determination of an available IFA
Grounds_for_Claim: alleged lack of a safe internal flight alternative in Colombia
Legal_Standard: The IFA test has two criteria: no serious possibility of persecution in the IFA location and reasonable conditions for seeking refuge there
Assessment_Factor: psychological effects did not meet the unreasonableness threshold
Procedural_Issue: Federal Court reviewed the Board's decision regarding the existence of an IFA in Pereira
Review_Standard: Reasonableness and defensibility based on facts and law
Application_Basis: Existence of an internal flight alternative in Pereira
Evidence_Assessed: Evidence showing FARC's threat was concentrated elsewhere
lack of evidence that FARC could locate applicant in Pereira
conditions in Pereira not endangering safety
Governing_Rule: IFA test: (1) no serious possibility of persecution in IFA, (2) reasonable conditions for seeking refuge
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Insufficient proof that FARC could locate the applicant in Pereira
psychological effects alone insufficient to establish unreasonableness
Harm_Assessment: No serious possibility of persecution in Pereira
psychological effects not rising to level of persecution
Cause_Description: Applicant claimed refugee protection due to threats from FARC and alleged lack of a safe internal flight alternative in Colombia
Evidence_Handling: Board considered documentary evidence and applicant's testimony
Evidence_Issues: Psychological impact not sufficient to prove unreasonableness
lack of specific evidence linking FARC to Pereira in relation to applicant
Evidence_Assessment: Board reasonably assessed evidence regarding threat distribution and safety in Pereira
Decision_Rationale: Board's decision was reasonable and defensible based on facts and law
Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of concrete evidence that applicant would be at risk in Pereira
subjective fear not corroborated by objective evidence
